subject: Learning
title: Flow State: Peak Performance
description: One-minute skill: Flow State: Peak Performance.

hook.text: A rock climber loses track of time for three hours. She was completely absorbed. That's flow.

buildup.text: Mihaly Csikszentmihalyi described flow as a state of total immersion where self-awareness vanishes.

discovery.text: Flow occurs when challenge and skill are perfectly balancedâ€”too easy bores, too hard frustrates.

twist.text: In flow, the brain's prefrontal cortex actually quiets down. You think less and perform better.

climax.text: People in flow report their highest levels of happiness, creativity, and productivity.

punchline.text: Flow isn't working harder. It's losing yourself in the work.

quiz.question: When does flow state occur?
options: When challenge and skill are perfectly balanced
When the task is extremely easy
